originContent: - When two tiles with the same number collide, they merge into one.
translatedContent: - Lorsque deux tuiles portant le m√™me chiffre se percutent, elles fusionnent en une seule.

originContent: - After each move, a new 2 or 4 will randomly appear in an empty spot.
translatedContent: - Apr√®s chaque d√©placement, un 2 ou un 4 appara√Ætra al√©atoirement dans une case vide.

originContent: - The game ends when there are no more moves left.
translatedContent: - La partie se termine lorsqu'aucun mouvement n'est possible.

originContent: - Made a wrong move? No worries!

originContent: - Just hit the "Undo" button to go back one step.
translatedContent: - Appuyez simplement sur le bouton "Annuler" pour revenir d'un pas en arri√®re.

originContent: - You can undo as many times as you like, all the way back to the start.

originContent: - Never let a slip of the finger ruin your game again!
